form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS, FORM FS-398

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/25/2023 DEPARTMENT OF STATE PLACE -Nicaracdea FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA DATE OF EXAMINATION MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS Dea.11-87 At the request of the American Consul at Manaoua CITY COUNTRY nicaraoua I certify that on the above date I examined NAME AGE SEX Rodolfo BEARS PASSPORT NO. 0 ISSUED BY Mejia 73 M WHQ ON C061418 Nic-Goverment June 15-82 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Insanity Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class - A, B, or C - diagnosis, and pertinent details*): Chest X-ray report NORMAL # / Dec-11-87 Blood serological report minutors salled from Dr. Fab from Dr. R. Caldrom Other special report(s) (when needed) NeGaTivo HIV.TesT. tab. minitire Salud from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL DATE OF FINAL REPORT FORM TECHNICAL ADVISOR *Continue TITLE side FS-398 on reverse if necessary. Dec 15-87 10-74
